org.apache.lucene.codecs.lucene50

Class Lucene50PostingsReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.codecs.PostingsReaderBase
      • org.apache.lucene.codecs.lucene50.Lucene50PostingsReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, Accountable

    public final class Lucene50PostingsReader
extends PostingsReaderBase
    Concrete class that reads docId(maybe frq,pos,offset,payloads) list with postings format.
    WARNING: This API is experimental and might change in incompatible ways in the next release.

        public void checkIntegrity()

        Description copied from class: PostingsReaderBase
        Checks consistency of this reader.

        Note that this may be costly in terms of I/O, e.g. may involve computing a checksum value against large data files.
